server

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.util.Observer
    A class modelling the game controller on the server.
    Author:
    pmbos

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(int id,
                  int preference,
                  ServerUI tui)
        Creates a controller with the given id, preference and ui.
        Parameters:
        id - the id to assign this controller.
        preference - the preference to assign the game associated with this controller.
        tui - the ui to use.

    • Method Detail

      • hasStarted

        public boolean hasStarted()
        Returns:
        true if the game has already started, false otherwise.

        Waits for the game to reach the preferred amount of players, or the minimal amount.
        Specified by:

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Checks if the start requirements are met when the number of players of the game increases. Decreases the number of players if a client is unreachable.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Shuts down every connection of every player of the game connected to this controller.

          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Plays a game of spectrangle.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - when the game gets interrupted.

      • constructTurnMade

        public java.lang.String constructTurnMade(Tile old,
                                          int index,
                                          int rotation,
                                          java.lang.String[] move)
        Constructs a turn made message.
        Parameters:
        old - the tile used in the play.
        index - the index the tile was placed on.
        rotation - the rotation that was used.
        move - the type of move that was made.
        Returns:
        a String indicating that a turn has been made.

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(java.lang.String[] arg)
        Finds the first tile in the given argument if it complies with the protocol.
        Parameters:
        arg - the argument to extract a tile from.
        Returns:
        a Tile extracted from the string, null if it doesn't comply.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex(java.lang.String arg)
        Finds the index in the given argument if it complies with the protocol.
        Parameters:
        arg - the argument to extract an index from.
        Returns:
        a int extracted from the string.

      • getRotation

        public int getRotation(java.lang.String arg)
        Finds the rotation in the given argument if it complies with the protocol.
        Parameters:
        arg - the argument to extract a rotation from.
        Returns:
        an int extracted from the string, -1 if it doesn't comply.
